content.text: What is intimate attempt chance based on as shown in prompt?

3 factors shown on prompt: Sex Appeal, time-since, and location score. Plus hidden bonuses which include special items, party drugs, or bonus help to get started. Time-since less than day is generally negative and increasingly positive after 24 hours until maximum at around 10 days. Location score includes bonus from special bed (Vault bed, double-bed, or intimate bed), bed ownership (yours or companion's), weather, season, hour of day, and nearby awake NPCs.
Camera after bed stays low or in wrong position

Try toggle 1st/3rd-person view, or crouch/sneak. If using another custom camera disable this custom camera in the MCM. When sleeping loading a save-game may cause camera to become stuck. Exit to main menu and load save again.

The 'Rest' will hide when in Power Armor, weapon drawn, sneaking, over-encumbered, or if bed marked incompatible by the mod. If only 'Sleep' may have another mod altering bed activation such as place-anywhere or set-private mod. If instead of 'Sleep' states, 'Awaken' then sneak or try activate bed to reset.
Crouch/Sneak to regain controls. Beds require enough space on the sides and above for character to enter and exit. Avoid blue tarp-tent and other beds with low hanging obstructions.

Crouch to cancel and redress. May have accidentally activated a nearby furniture. Remember to activate same bed sleeping in to exit. Is Redress after Rest enabled?
